name: Becoming a Legend for dummies
description:
A little game I made for the Vulcan Jam 4. 

Jump around, don't fall in lava or spikes, stab enemys from behind and try to be a legend!

Controls:

W,A,S,D || Move

Space || Attack

R || Restart level

M || Back to main menu

Avoid lava and stuff, also Enemys can attack you from the front and from above.

Credits:

Made with the Unity game engine.

Environment: Free - Fantasy Pack - VL.II - Castle Prison by Anokolisa

Characters: Animated Knights Character Pack by RGS_Dev

Misc: 16x16 RPG Item Pack by Alex's Assets

KNOWN BUGS: Jump animation is not playing right (this is a bug only occuring in builds, the animation will play correct in the unity editor. Use Source code to see)
